name: Labyrinth: Stars and Stone [DEMO]
description:
If you are on any device except mobile/tablet, please play the downloadable version ♥

Astraia isn't entirely unfamiliar with feats of strength and heroism, but being sent to defeat a monster who turns people to stone might be a little over her head. Not because of the monster, really, but because she keeps running into women who make her heart pound—!

Toga Party refers to all the members who worked hard on bringing Labyrinth: Stars and Stone to you!

  • Teasugarr: Character design & art
  • Raseruuu: Background art
  • Tavian St. James: Music
  • Foleso: GUI Art, Promotional graphics, Scripting
Twitter: https://twitter.com/labyrinth_vn
